cards.name: Agatha Harkness
cards.ability: At the start of the game, draw Agatha. She controls your cards on even turns.

cards.name: Agent Venom
cards.ability: On Reveal: Set the Power of all cards in your deck to 3.

cards.name: Ares
cards.ability: On Reveal: Compare the Power of the top 3 cards of both decks. If your total is higher, +6 Power.

cards.name: Banner Hulk
cards.ability: Unknown

cards.name: Black Widow
cards.ability: Activate: Add a Widow's Bite to your opponent’s hand.

cards.name: Bruce Banner
cards.ability: When you end a turn with unspent Energy, 25% chance to HULK OUT!

cards.name: Bullseye
cards.ability: Activate: Discard all cards that cost 1 or less from your hand. Afflict that many different enemy cards with -2 Power.)

cards.name: Crystal
cards.ability: On Reveal: Each player draws a card.

cards.name: Destroyer
cards.ability: On Reveal: Destroy your other cards.

cards.name: Doctor Doom 2099
cards.ability: After each turn, add a DoomBot 2099 to a random location if you played (exactly) 1 card.

cards.name: DoomBot 2099
cards.ability: Ongoing: Your other DoomBots and Doom have +1 Power.

cards.name: Galacta
cards.ability: Each turn, the first card you play at another location reveals with +3 Power.

cards.name: Gorgon
cards.ability: Ongoing: Your opponent's cards that didn't start in their deck cost 1 more. (maximum 6)

cards.name: Heimdall
cards.ability: On Reveal: Move your other cards one location to the left.

cards.name: Ice Cube
cards.ability: At the start of each turn, get +1 Energy. Then destroy this if your side is full here.

cards.name: Iron Patriot
cards.ability: On Reveal: Add a random 4, 5, or 6-Cost card to your hand. If you’re winning here after next turn, give it -4 Cost.

cards.name: Jessica Jones
cards.ability: On Reveal: If you don't play a card here next turn, +5 Power.

cards.name: Lasher
cards.ability: Activate: Afflict an enemy card here with negative Power equal to this card's Power.

cards.name: Luna Snow
cards.ability: On Reveal: Add an Ice Cube to each side of this location.

cards.name: Moonstone
cards.ability: Ongoing: Has the Ongoing effects of your 1, 2, and 3-Cost cards here.

cards.name: Peni Parker
cards.ability: On Reveal: Add SP//dr to your hand. When this merges, you get +1 Energy next turn.

cards.name: Rocket and Groot
cards.ability: You can move this once. After your opponent plays a card here, steal 1 Power from it.

cards.name: Shadow King
cards.ability: On Reveal: Reset all cards here to their original Power.

cards.name: Silver Sable
cards.ability: On Reveal: Steal 2 Power from the top card of your opponent's deck.

cards.name: Skaar
cards.ability: Costs 2 less for each of your cards that has 10 or more Power.

cards.name: SP//dr
cards.ability: On Reveal: Merge with one of your cards here. You can move that card next turn.

cards.name: Surtur
cards.ability: After you play a card with 10 or more Power, this gains +3 Power.

cards.name: Thanos
cards.ability: At the start of the game, draw Thanos and shuffle the six Infinity Stones into your deck.

cards.name: Toxie Doxie
cards.ability: On Reveal: Draw a card. You can't play cards next turn.

cards.name: Valentina
cards.ability: On Reveal: Add a random 6-Cost card to your hand. Give it -2 Cost and -2 Power.

cards.name: Victoria Hand
cards.ability: Ongoing: Your cards created in your hand have +2 Power.

cards.name: Winter Soldier
cards.text: “It's time for me to face the past.”

locations.name: Asgard Besieged
locations.ability: After turn 3, add The Destroyer to the winning side.

locations.name: Spider Island
locations.ability: After you play a card here, move it.

items.name: Agent Venom
changes: 2/4 - On Reveal: Set the Power of all cards in your deck to 4.
2/5 - On Reveal: Set the Power of all cards in your deck to 3.

items.name: Surtur
changes: 3/5 - After you play a card with 10 or more Power, this gains +3 Power.

items.name: Skaar
changes: 6/11 - Costs 2 less for each of your cards that has 10 or more Power.

items.name: Silver Sable
changes: 1/1 - On Reveal: Steal 2 Power from the top card of your opponent’s deck.

items.name: Shadow King
changes: 2/3 - On Reveal: Reset all cards here to their original Power.

items.name: Black Widow
changes: 3/3 - On Reveal: Add a Widow's Bite to your opponent’s hand.
3/4 - Activate: Add a Widow's Bite to your opponent’s hand.

items.name: Destroyer
changes: 6/14 - On Reveal: Destroy your cards at other locations.

items.name: Valentina
changes: 2/3 - On Reveal: Add a random 6-Cost card to your hand. Give it -2 Cost and -3 Power.
2/3 - On Reveal: Add a random 6-Cost card to your hand. Give it -2 Cost and -2 Power.

items.name: Jessica Jones
changes: 4/5 - On Reveal: If you don’t play a card at this location next turn, +4 Power.
4/5 - On Reveal: If you don’t play a card at this location next turn, +5 Power.

items.name: Heimdall
changes: 6/9 - On Reveal: Move your other cards one location to the left.

items.name: Crystal
changes: 3/3 - On Reveal: Each player draws a card.

items.name: Agatha Harkness (text only)
changes: 6/14 - Agatha starts in your hand. She plays your cards for you on even turns.
6/14 - At the start of the game, draw Agatha. She controls your cards on even turns.

items.name: Thanos
changes: 6/10 - Starts in your opening hand and shuffles the six Infinity Stones into your deck.
6/10 - At the start of the game, draw Thanos and shuffle the six Infinity Stones into your deck.
